title: unspecified error occurredplease check the logs for more information PLS HELP
body: When i try reinstalling league of legends its just says unspecified error occurredplease check the logs for more information when its like 40-50 and then i had to start over at 33 again. I have tried using hextech repair tool but its still not working could someone pls help me. Sorry for bad english

replies.body:
Aha, I recognize this error. It's usually a sign your permissions are not currently set to allow LoL to patch itself properly. No worries, this guide [**right here**](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) has steps to follow for fixing them. Should be able to patch normally following that, but feel free to hit me up if the guide doesn't help as expected.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
